diff_act: 1.Log the unit unavailable event in the system for auditing purposes.
5.Record any relevant error messages or codes.
6.Identify the heating or cooling unit involved.

regen.absent_element: complete record of details including unit involved, time of request, error messages or codes
regen.new_specification: The system shall log the time of the request, the specific unit involved, and any relevant error messages or codes when a request is denied.

regen.absent_element: detailed recording of event information like time, source, and specific unit involved
regen.new_specification: The system shall record the details of the denied request event, including the time of the request, source thermostat, specific unit involved, and any relevant error messages or codes for auditing purposes.

regen.absent_element: recording the time of the request and the specific unit involved in the system event
regen.new_specification: The system event shall include the time of the request and identification of the specific heating or cooling unit involved.

label: This system event shall contain a designation of the heating or cooling unit that was not turned.
absence: the designation of the not turned unit should be contained in the event
